about.summary: pytest plugin to display test execution output like a SPECIFICATION

name: pytest-spec
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}

package:
  name: pytest-spec
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pytest-spec-{{version}}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/pchomik/pytest-spec/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 12368660b1810ef4a46ea05dad367b7e8f402d829538f0d777a18a0b47e2c829

build:
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
    number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pytest
    - mock >=1.0.1

test:
  source_files:
    - test
  commands:
    - py.test test

about:
  home: https://github.com/pchomik/pytest-spec
  license: GPL-2.0
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'pytest plugin to display test execution output like a SPECIFICATION'

  dev_url: https://github.com/pchomik/pytest-spec

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mcg1969

about.summary: pytest plugin to display test execution output like a SPECIFICATION
